description:
Crafted with polyester and spandex, this junior balaclava provides a secure and long-lasting fit. The open section accommodates different hairstyles, while the breathing ports promote airflow and comfort. With an anti-bacterial mesh lining, it ensures hygiene and warmth during chilly conditions, making it an ideal choice for young adventurers.

  • Its overlap system allows for compatibility with the helmet
  • Open section to let hair out
  • Flat lock seam
  • Breathing ports with anti-bacterial mesh inner lining
  • Reflective
name: Auclair Ponytrail Junior Balaclava - Children to Youths
